author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Celebrate the first of the new season’s asparagus with this easy starter. You can use only green asparagus, or include white and purple spears.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Asparagus,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Roasted Asparagus With Aïoli Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 24 asparagus spears, including at least 12 green spears
1 tomato, blanched, peeled, deseeded, and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Trim the asparagus. In a large frying pan, add water to a depth of 5cm and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat to mediumhigh and add a little salt. Blanch the asparagus, starting with the white and purple spears, if using, for 7 minutes. Then add the green spears and cook for a further 3 minutes. Drain and refresh under cold running water.
Dry the pan and add the oil. Fry the asparagus in a single layer, in batches, for 5 minutes, until a little charred. Remove from the pan and arrange them on plates.
Place a generous tablespoon of aïoli on each plate and scatter over the basil, dill, and tomato. Season with a little pepper and serve immediately.
